Package com.azure.spring.cloud.core.implementation.factory

Class AbstractAzureHttpClientBuilderFactory<T>

java.lang.Object
com.azure.spring.cloud.core.implementation.factory.AbstractAzureServiceClientBuilderFactory<T>
com.azure.spring.cloud.core.implementation.factory.AbstractAzureHttpClientBuilderFactory<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the http client builder.
All Implemented Interfaces:
AzureServiceClientBuilderFactory<T>, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAzureCredentialBuilderFactory, AbstractAzureStorageClientBuilderFactory, CertificateClientBuilderFactory, ConfigurationClientBuilderFactory, EventGridPublisherClientBuilderFactory, SecretClientBuilderFactory
public abstract class AbstractAzureHttpClientBuilderFactory<T> extends AbstractAzureServiceClientBuilderFactory<T>
Abstract factory of the http client builder.

    • configureCore

      protected void configureCore(T builder)
      Description copied from class: AbstractAzureServiceClientBuilderFactory
      Configure Azure core level configurations. The core configuration consists of following steps:
      1. Configure Application Id.
      2. Configure Azure environment.
      3. Configure Configuration.
      4. Configure retry.
      5. Configure proxy.
      6. Configure credential.
      7. Configure connection string.
      8. Configure default credential.
      Overrides:
      configureCore in class AbstractAzureServiceClientBuilderFactory<T>
      Parameters:
      builder - The service client builder.

    • configureHttpClient

      protected void configureHttpClient(T builder)
      Configure the HttpClient to the AbstractAzureHttpClientBuilderFactory builder. If a HttpPipeline is provided to the factory, the pipeline will be set to the builder. Otherwise, a HttpClient will be created and together with the HttpPipelinePolicy set to the factory will be configured to the builder.
      Parameters:
      builder - The builder of the HTTP-based service client.
